MR No. 1489 - Speaking at Camp Meeting; Counsel for Achieving Happiness in Marriage

     (Written in September, 1870, at the Ohio camp meeting, Clyde, Ohio, to "Dear Children, Edson and Emma.") 


     I have spoken to a large and attentive audience. Young and old were perfectly quiet and respectfully attentive. I had great liberty in speaking, for which I am grateful to God.
